about_the_game:
In a world where peace is maintained at a high price, Emin appears, a young mystical warrior who faces battles on the borders of the magical kingdom to guarantee the tranquility of her people. However, her existence is seen by some as just a legend, while for others it is a never-before-told story, shrouded in mystery and bravery. Along her journey, Emin will face epic challenges and discover ancient secrets, showing the world the true meaning of courage and sacrifice.

Enter the global competition and take first place in the world rankings with this exciting pixel art action game! Explore a dynamic world as you progress, defeating enemies and acquiring increasingly powerful abilities. Challenge players from all over the world and prove that you are the best in this game full of challenges and adrenaline.
